lst.name: sentence
lst.str: U.S. Agriculture Secretary Richard Lyng told representatives of several of the largest grain exporting firms and two farm organizations that he was not in a position to comment on their request that the Reagan administration offer subsidized wheat to the Soviet Union, according to participants in today's meeting.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "He (Lyng) simply told us he was not in any position to talk about an EEP (export enhancement program) initiative to the Soviet Union," said Glen Hofer, vice president of the National Council of Farmer Cooperatives.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: But Hofer said other important matters at the White House, rather than an absence of political pressure, might have restrained Lyng.
